entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 later this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
